title: Sam Bankman-Fried considered ‘coming out as Republican’ — Bloomberg
description: Sam Bankman-Fried was brainstorming ways to address his public image following the collapse of FTX, court documents reveal.

title: $200B Financial Group Cetera Approves 4 Spot Bitcoin ETFs on Its Platform
description: Cetera Financial Group, a platform with $475 billion in assets under administration and $190 billion in assets under management, has approved four U.S. spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) for use in brokerage accounts on its platform. “We are prudently embracing bitcoin ETFs and we prioritized developing this important guidance to help our financial professionals implement […]

title: Is Invisibility Just a Fantasy or a Fascinating Field of Engineering?
description: Invisibility, a concept once relegated to the realms of science fiction and fantasy, is now emerging as a tangible reality in the world of engineering. Imagine being able to render objects or even entire structures invisible to the naked eye, akin to the mythical cloaking devices depicted in literature and cinema. Recent advancements in optical […]
